codeReview.summary: Implementation satisfies OS-331 and VAL-BUG-003: `output()` now accepts optional `format` as the second argument with precedence format > env > default human; `OutputOptions.mode` was removed; callsites were migrated; comprehensive output/exitWithError tests and a changeset were added.

sharedStateObservations.observation: `library-worker` verification guidance remains partially out of sync with mission-level constraints: it mandates unconditional `bun run test` and `bun run check`, while mission AGENTS documents known pre-existing full-suite failures and directs workers to use `bun run lint` and `bun run typecheck` instead of `bun run check`.
